entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
